EXPERIMENT.author: lydiahallie
EXPERIMENT.text_preview:
Claude Code now supports agent teams (in research preview)

Instead of a single agent working through a task sequentiall
EXPERIMENT.reason: Agent teams are a new feature. While we use the delegation pattern, this is a new implementation of it directly within Claude Code that could be useful for cross-project coordination in our sibling repo (hall-of-fake).
relevance: Cross-project coordination with hall-of-fake sibling repo
EXPERIMENT.proposed_action: Investigate the potential benefits and drawbacks of using Claude Code agent teams for cross-project coordination, especially addressing known issues in the sibling repo.

EXPERIMENT.author: sharbel
EXPERIMENT.text_preview:
Most people bookmark tweets and never look at them again

So I built an openclaw skill that reads your bookmarks and tel
EXPERIMENT.reason: This is directly relevant to the autonomous daily bookmark monitor we are actively building. It proposes a mechanism for extracting actions and categorizing bookmarks, which is precisely what we need for our analysis engine.
EXPERIMENT.proposed_action: Investigate the x-bookmarks skill and adapt or incorporate its action extraction and categorization methods into our bookmark analysis pipeline.

NOTED.author: bcherny
NOTED.text_preview: Reflecting on what engineers love about Claude Code, one thing that jumps out is its customizability: hooks, plugins, LS
NOTED.reason: We already use Claude Code extensively and leverage many of the customization features mentioned (hooks, skills, MCPs). Boris confirming the customizability is good to know, but doesn't require any action.

We've added Plan Mode to Claude Code in Slack. 

When you give Claude a complex task it will ask you clarifying question

Claude Code on desktop now supports local plugins

Install custom slash commands, skills, and MCP servers from the marke

NOTED.author: _catwu
NOTED.text_preview:
Want to set up a Claude Code customization, but don't want to read docs? 

My favorite shortcut is to ask the claude cod
NOTED.reason: We actively use Claude Code for execution and specifically use /create-skill and YAML frontmatter for slash commands. This tip is a shortcut for what we already do.
relevance: Delegation pattern: Claude.ai for planning, Claude Code for execution
